Create grouping variable

Source: R/create_group_variable.R
create_group_variable.Rd

Given a data frame and a vector of variables, creates a new variable that assigns a unique ID to each group of rows that have the same values for the given variables. The function will return the data frame with the new id variable added.

Usage

create_group_variable(.data, groupvars, groupid)

Arguments

.data

A data frame, tibble, or data.table. No default.

groupvars

A vector of character variables which are the names of the columns to sort on. No default.

groupid

ID grouping variable name. No default.

Value

A copy of the input data with the addition of the grouping ID variable

On this page
